name: Noon USN
description: Noon Capital is building a yield-bearing stablecoin called USN, designed to maintain a 1:1 peg with the US Dollar while offering competitive yields. The project aims to provide a stable, interest-bearing asset for users seeking a secure store of value with returns that can potentially outpace inflation. USN generates revenue through a sophisticated basis yield strategy, combining different strategies to ensure consistent returns across various market conditions.
